writing_guidelines.description: The name provided by the brand owner intended to be recognized by the consumer.
Name of the person who planned the form, look, or workings of the product.
A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but licensed for the product.
Product lines exist as a sub-structure of brands.

summary: The document outlines mandatory attributes for apparel items, including guidelines for brand names, designers, brand licenses, manufacturer names, and product lines.
